snippet.title: The Shadows That Linger - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Now! - https://crimson-ink-games-llc.itch.io/the-shadows-that-linger
Welcome to The Shadows That Linger.

Your psychic powers allow you to see what others cannot. Play as a medium named Ilana in this ethereal mystery and solve your sister's murder on behalf of her lingering shadow. With time running out before her restless spirit becomes lost in purgatory forever, converse with your newly acquainted in-laws to gather leads in tense dialogues, explore their picturesque estate, and use your crystal ball to peer into the realm of shadows and discover clues with spiritual connections. After collecting sufficient evidence, accuse whom you believe the murderer is to get one step closer to saving your sister's soul.

Follow us:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theshadowsthatlinger/
